description: Classroom and laboratory experiences in nursing and health assessment skills develop the
student's ability to provide nursing care.  Opportunities are provided to apply knowledge from the
liberal arts and nursing theory to simulated patient care situations.  Individual practice sessions
in the nursing laboratory are expected.  Performance testing determines readiness for the role of
caregiver in a variety of clinical settings.  Taken concurrently with Nursing 302, 304, 308. Offered
